pages.text: Verdalis is the school of nature and life in all its forms. Its practitioners can commune with the plants and animals of Thalrathis, calling upon the earth itself for power.
From summoning treants to manipulating vines and healing with natural herbs, Verdalis allows its mages to shape the world with an organic touch.

Practitioners are in tune with the land, drawing strength from the cycles of natureâ€”life, death, and rebirth. Verdalis magic is a blend of creation and destruction, a force that can both nurture life and consume it.
